TopicTitle: Just saying hello and a short comment on the program

Articles.Content:
Hello and, WOW!

Found you by looking at Serious Sam vids on Youtube, no idea why it linked here, downloaded the software and figured it would be insta-baffled Hitch. Instead I managed to get into space without killing anyone (first time anyway, had a few deaths after...) and am loving it enough to buy it.

Looking forward to the future updates and being able to make full orbit!

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky
